proxy.name: ClubWebService
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <definitions targetNamespace="http://www.openuri.org" xmlns:tns="http://www.openuri.org" xmlns:wsr="http://www.openuri.org/2002/10/soap/reliability/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap12enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:conv="http://www.openuri.org/2002/04/wsdl/conversation/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">
<types>
<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="java:com.telcel.k2.dtos.common" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:stns="java:com.telcel.k2.dtos.common"> <xsd:import namespace="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:complexType name="AtributoDTO"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="xsd:long" name="idAtributo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="nombre" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:anyType" name="valor" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MensajeDTO"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="tp:List" name="atributos" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" xmlns:tp="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="content" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="id" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MensajeErrorDTO"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="stns:MensajeDTO"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="tipo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationResultDTO"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="tp:List" name="errors" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" xmlns:tp="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:boolean" name="existWarnings" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element type="tp:List" name="items" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" xmlns:tp="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:element type="tp:List" name="keys" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" xmlns:tp="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="name" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:boolean" name="success" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element type="tp:List" name="warnings" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true" xmlns:tp="java:language_builtins.util"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="java:k2.commons.dto" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:stns="java:k2.commons.dto"> <xsd:complexType name="AbstractDTO" abstract="true"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="java:k2.commons.dto.club" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:stns="java:k2.commons.dto.club"> <xsd:import namespace="java:k2.commons.dto"/> <xsd:import namespace="java:language_builtins.util"/> <xsd:complexType name="InfoAfiliacionClubDTO"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tp:AbstractDTO" xmlns:tp="java:k2.commons.dto"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="apellidoCliente" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="cedula" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="codigo" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="descripcion" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:dateTime" name="fecha" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="nombreCliente" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="segmento" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="telefono" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="java:language_builtins.util" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:stns="java:language_builtins.util"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:complexType name="List"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="soapenc:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="soapenc:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="xsd:anyType[]" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="validarAfiliacionCliente"> <part type="partns:InfoAfiliacionClubDTO" name="infoAfiliacionClubDTO" xmlns:partns="java:k2.commons.dto.club"/> <part type="partns:dateTime" name="date" xmlns:partns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> </message> <message name="validarAfiliacionClienteResponse"> <part type="partns:OperationResultDTO" name="result" xmlns:partns="java:com.telcel.k2.dtos.common"/> </message> <portType name="ClubWebServicePort"> <operation name="validarAfiliacionCliente"> <input message="tns:validarAfiliacionCliente"/> <output message="tns:validarAfiliacionClienteResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding type="tns:ClubWebServicePort" name="ClubWebServicePort"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="validarAfiliacionCliente"> <soap:operation style="rpc" soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body namespace="http://www.openuri.org" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body namespace="http://www.openuri.org" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="ClubWebService"> <port name="ClubWebServicePort" binding="tns:ClubWebServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://k2server:18001/K2/ClubWebService.jws"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

proxy.name: Cobros
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <definitions targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:tns="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve"> <xsd:complexType name="service"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="idPrepaid" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="idPostpaid" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types>
<message name="adjustmentRequest"> <part name="transactionID" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="contentType" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="service" type="tns:service"/> <part name="action" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fee" type="xsd:float"/> </message> <message name="adjustmentResponse"> <part name="result" type="xsd:long"/> </message> <message name="billingDateRequest"> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="billingDateResponse"> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="billingDate" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="platform" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="code" type="xsd:long"/> <part name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
<portType name="ProvisioningPortType"> <operation name="billingDate"> <input name="Request" message="tns:billingDateRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:billingDateResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="adjustment"> <input name="Request" message="tns:adjustmentRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:adjustmentResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name="ProvisioningBinding" type="tns:ProvisioningPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="billingDate"> <soap:operation soapAction="billingDate"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="adjustment"> <soap:operation soapAction="adjustment"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name="Provisioning"> <port name="ProvisioningPort" binding="tns:ProvisioningBinding"> <soap:address location="http://10.164.7.16:24003/services/uci"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

proxy.name: CobrosSDP
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <s0:definitions name="ChargeToMovistarClient" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/ChargeToMovistarClient/" xmlns:s0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:s1="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:s2="http://www.example.org/ChargeToMovistarClient/" xmlns:s3="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <s0:message name="ChargeToMovistarClientRequest"> <s0:part name="version" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="transactionID" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="DeviceType" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="MSISDN" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="serviceId" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="productId" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="ServiceName" type="s1:string"/>
<s0:part name="action" type="s1:string"/> <s0:part name="fee" type="s1:float"/> </s0:message> <s0:message name="ChargeToMovistarClientResponse"> <s0:part name="result" type="s1:string"/> </s0:message>
<s0:portType name="ChargeToMovistarClient"> <s0:operation name="ChargeToMovistarClient"> <s0:input message="s2:ChargeToMovistarClientRequest"/>
<s0:output message="s2:ChargeToMovistarClientResponse"/> </s0:operation> </s0:portType>
<s0:binding name="ChargeToMovistarClientSOAP" type="s2:ChargeToMovistarClient"> <s3:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <s0:operation name="ChargeToMovistarClient"> <s3:operation soapAction="http://www.example.org/ChargeToMovistarClient/NewOperation"/> <s0:input> <s3:body namespace="http://www.example.org/ChargeToMovistarClient/" use="literal"/> </s0:input> <s0:output> <s3:body namespace="http://www.example.org/ChargeToMovistarClient/" use="literal"/>
</s0:output> </s0:operation> </s0:binding>
<s0:service name="ChargeToMovistarClientSOAPQSService1"> <s0:port binding="s2:ChargeToMovistarClientSOAP" name="ChargeToMovistarClientSOAPQSPort1"> <s3:address location="http://fastwsrvd:20001/SDP/proxies/ChargeToMovistarClientProxy"/>
</s0:port> </s0:service> </s0:definitions>

proxy.name: Incidencias
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <definitions targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:tns="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve"> <xsd:complexType name="incidencia"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="fechaAjuste" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="fechaReclamo" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="movilPPVV" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="movilINCID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="movilCORR" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="monto" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="validar" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="response"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="response" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types>
<message name="incidenciaTelpagoRequest"> <part name="incidenciaTelpago" type="tns:incidencia"/> </message> <message name="incidenciaTelpagoResponse"> <part name="incidenciaTelpago" type="tns:response"/> </message>
<portType name="ProvisioningPortType"> <operation name="incidenciaTelpago"> <input name="Request" message="tns:incidenciaTelpagoRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:incidenciaTelpagoResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name="ProvisioningBinding" type="tns:ProvisioningPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="incidenciaTelpago"> <soap:operation soapAction="incidenciaTelpago"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name="Provisioning"> <port name="ProvisioningPort" binding="tns:ProvisioningBinding"> <soap:address location="http://local:24001/services/incidencias"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

proxy.name: Oferta
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <definitions targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:tns="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve"> <xsd:complexType name="auditoria"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element type="xsd:dateTime" name="fechaOperacion" minOccurs="1" nillable="true" maxOccurs="1"> </xsd:element> <xsd:element type="xsd:long" name="idAplicacion" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> </xsd:element> <xsd:element type="xsd:string" name="loginOperador" minOccurs="1" nillable="true" maxOccurs="1"> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types>
<message name="validarPlataformaRequest"> <part name="tipoIdentLegal" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="identLegal" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="flagOperacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fechaOperacion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="validarPlataformaResponse"> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="plataforma" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="activarPrepagoRequest"> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="flagOperacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fechaOperacion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="activarPrepagoResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="montoRenta" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="topeRenta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="codFeature" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="nombrePlan" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="activarPostpagoRequest"> <part name="auditoria" type="tns:auditoria" /> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="activarPostpagoResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="montoRenta" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="topeRenta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="codFeature" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="nombrePlan" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
<message name="desactivarPrepagoRequest"> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="razonDesconexion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="desactivarPrepagoResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fechaTope" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
<message name="desactivarPostpagoRequest"> <part name="auditoria" type="tns:auditoria"/> <part name="msisdn" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="razonDesconexion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="desactivarPostpagoResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fechaTope" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
<portType name="ProvisioningPortType"> <operation name="validarPlataforma"> <input name="Request" message="tns:validarPlataformaRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:validarPlataformaResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="activarPrepago"> <input name="Request" message="tns:activarPrepagoRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:activarPrepagoResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="activarPostpago"> <input name="Request" message="tns:activarPostpagoRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:activarPostpagoResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="desactivarPrepago"> <input name="Request" message="tns:desactivarPrepagoRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:desactivarPrepagoResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="desactivarPostpago"> <input name="Request" message="tns:desactivarPostpagoRequest"/> <output name="Response" message="tns:desactivarPostpagoResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name="ProvisioningBinding" type="tns:ProvisioningPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="validarPlataforma"> <soap:operation soapAction="ValidarPlataforma"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="activarPrepago"> <soap:operation soapAction="ActivarPrepago"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="activarPostpago"> <soap:operation soapAction="ActivarPostpago"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="desactivarPrepago"> <soap:operation soapAction="DesactivarPrepago"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="desactivarPostpago"> <soap:operation soapAction="DesactivarPostpago"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name="Provisioning"> <port name="ProvisioningPort" binding="tns:ProvisioningBinding"> <soap:address location="http://10.164.7.16:25001/services/oferta"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

proxy.name: Recargas
proxy.wsdl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <definitions targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:tns="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">
<types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://provisioning.movistar.com.ve"> <xsd:complexType name="cupo"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="tipo" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="cantidad" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="cupos"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cupo" type="tns:cupo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types>
<message name="validarMovilRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="validarMovilResponse"> <part name="cuenta" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ajusteCoordRequest"> <part name="usuario" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="ajuste" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="cuenta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="comentario" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="monto" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="operacion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ajusteCoordResponse"> <part name="operacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ajustePtoRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="tarjetas" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="monto" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="transaccion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="tipo" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="login" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ajustePtoResponse"> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="compraPinRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="tarjetas" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="transaccion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="login" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="compraPinResponse"> <part name="respuesta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="descripcion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="tarjetas" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaSaldoRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaSaldoResponse"> <part name="cuenta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="saldoActual" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="saldoDisponible" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="fechaSaldo" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="ultimoPago" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="fechaUltimoPago" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="tipo" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="fechaTopeRenta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="indicador" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="cantidadPromedio" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="saldoAir" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="montoRenta" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="cupos" type="tns:cupos"/> </message> <message name="aplicaPinRequest"> <part name="pin" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="monto" type="xsd:double"/> </message> <message name="aplicaPinResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> </message > <message name="consultaPinRequest"> <part name="pin" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:integer"/> <part name="login" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="transaccion" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaPinResponse"> <part name="estatus" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mensaje" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="saldo" type="xsd:double"/> <part name="pinNull" type="xsd:integer"/> <part name="transaccion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="serial" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="status" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pin" type="xsd:string"/> </message>
